channel.title: Posts on R-Ladies NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on R-Ladies NYC

item.title: Book club: Everybody Lies
item.description:
Please join us for our first book club discussion of 2018! Visit our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP.

Date: Saturday, January 20, 2018

Time: 3pm

Book: Everybody Lies: Big Data, New Data, and What the Internet Can Tell Us About Who We Really Are

Author: Seth Stephens-Davidowitz

Host: Rizzoli Bookstore

item.title: R in the World of Education
item.description:
Join us for our last event of 2017!

Erin Grand will speak about how she uses R in the World of Eduction. Visit our Meetup for more details and to RSVP.

Date: Tuesday, December 12, 2017

Time: 6:30pm

Speaker: Erin Grand

Host: AT&T NYC Data Science Research Center

item.title: Data Dive Night with Data for Democracy
item.description:
Let’s get together with our laptops and R skills and code to continue to explore Medicare spending data. Visit our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP.

Date: Tuesday, October 24, 2017

Time: 6:30pm

Host: Quartet Health

item.title: Book club: Truth of Truthiness
item.description:
Come join us for a discussion for our next book club discussion! Visit our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP.

Date: Saturday, September 30, 2017

Time: 12pm

Book: Truth or Truthiness: Distinguishing Fact from Fiction by Learning to Think Like a Data Scientist

Author: Howard Wainer

Host: Rizzoli Bookstore

item.title: Data Visualization Workshop, Part 1
item.description:
Joyce Robbins presents a workshop on creating heatmaps in R, and other more general data visualization tips and tricks. Visit our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP.

Joyce’s GitHub repo for this talk can be found here.

Date: Thursday, August 17, 2017

Time: 7pm

Instructor: Joyce Robbins

Host: Byte Academy

item.title: Summer Social!
item.description:
Let’s take a break from the heat and our desks for an R-Ladies summer social event! Visit our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP.

Date: Saturday, July 8, 2017

Time: 2pm

Where: Blue Ribbon Sushi Izakaya

item.title: Book club: Weapons of Math Destruction
item.description:
Come join us for a discussion for our next book club discussion! Visit our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP.

Date: Saturday, June 17, 2017

Time: 11am

Book: Weapons of Math Destruction: How Big Data Increases Inequality and Threatens Democracy

Author: Cathy O’Neil

Host: Rizzoli Bookstore

item.title: Tour of R in Peer to Peer Lending
item.description:
Catherine Pargeter speaks about how Orchard Platform, a fintech company, uses R. Visit our Meetup for more details and to RSVP.

Date: Tuesday, April 18, 2017

Time: 6:30pm

Speaker: Catherine Pargeter

Host: Orchard Platform

item.title: Book club: Dear Data
item.description:
Please join us for our inaugural book club event! Visit our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP.

Date: Saturday, March 11, 2017

Time: 11am

Book: Dear Data

Authors: Giorgia Lupi and Stefanie Posavec

Host: Rizzoli Bookstore

item.title: A Focus on Health
item.description:
Elena Colicino and Daniela Vazquez speak about how they use R. Vist our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP.

Date: Tuesday, February 21, 2017

Time: 6:30pm

Speakers: Elena Colicino and Daniela Vazquez

Host: Flatiron Health

item.title: Launching R-Ladies NYC!
item.description:
Come meet other local R-Ladies and hear Carissa Shafto speak about her use of R for data science at the Galen College of Nursing. Vist our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP.

Date: Monday, November 21, 2016

Time: 6:15pm

Speaker: Carissa Shafto

Host: RGGI Inc.
